short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fast,realtime crypto screener.Data:Binance Websockets API.Built-in link to open a pair on your exchange/TradingView app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypto Screener+ for Binance, is our new innovative web component. 

(IMPORTANT: The extension works worlwide for users whose device's IP address is NOT located in United States).

It is a super-fast, real-time crypto screener, designed as a browser add-on extension.

You can browse the Web, read the news, watch YouTube videos, etc, and with one click, without leaving the website you are, you can see real-time market prices among other useful data (all collected in a small list, funding rates, 24h move, etc). 

Each trading pair in the screenerâ€™s list, has also a built-in link allowing you to immediately open the corresponding pair on your exchange for trading, or on the classic Trading View application, either on the same webpage, or in a new webpage.
